item.title: Google Facebook Advertising sneakiness and a short update on #CryptoClassAction

item.title: These vaccines are unlikely to completely sterilize a population. Professor Sir John Bell, SAGE!
item.dc:creator: brianoflondon
item.description:
Archiving before this gets wiped! [Original source](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IMAkFKprzRQ)
JON SNOW DUMB STRUCK ! I would like to draw your attention to the fact that Professor Sir John Bell, professor of medicine at Oxford University, and a part of the GAVI team - Sir John is a member of SAGE (Scientific Advisory Group for Emergencies) and sits on the government’s vaccine task force that has negotiated the purchase of a handful of proposed vaccines to combat coronavirus - developing AstraZeneca's coronavirus vaccine, said in an interview with Jon Snow that "These vaccines are unlikely to completely sterilize a population. They are very likely to have an effect which works in a %, say 60 or 70%." Believe him, someone who has these levels of credentials doesn't misspeak without correcting himself.
Sterilization: 1.The process of making something free from bacteria or other living microorganisms. Microorganisms can be bacteria, fungi, archaea or protists. The term microorganisms does not include viruses and prions, which are generally classified as non-living.

item.title: Texas vs Everybody America vs Facebook and Two Guys in Israel vs Google and Facebook
item.dc:creator: brianoflondon

item.title: Everything changed at Gettysburg PA with Giuliani
item.dc:creator: brianoflondon
item.description:
Here’s why I think the energy shifted back to Trump when Giuliani and his team presented their evidence to State Legislators in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
This isn’t about the courts or even the Supreme Court. This is about State Legislators.

item.title: Josh Hawley Mark Zuckerberg Senate Judiciary Committee - Any Collusion?
item.dc:creator: brianoflondon
item.description:
Josh Hawley questions Mark Zuckerberg on co-ordination with Google and Twitter on censorship and web wide tracking. Senate hearing 17th November 2020
Senator Josh Hawley uses whistleblower information to question Mark Zuckerberg about co-ordination between Facebook, Google and Twitter on censorship decisions.
[Video is from C-Span but I've improved the sound quality](https://www.c-span.org/video/?c4924032/user-clip-josh-hawley-questions-mark-zuckerberg-ordination-google-twitter-censorship-web-wide).

item.title: Are the US voting systems designed to minimize fraud or maximize it? My experiences of UK and Israel
item.dc:creator: brianoflondon
item.description: I'm talking about the systems of voting in Israel and the UK including my experience of postal voting back to the UK.

item.title: Lets review where we are American Election at the beach

item.description: I'm talking about the USA Trump Biden Election while sitting at the beach in Tel Aviv in November.

item.title: The extraordinary arrogance of Twitter and Facebook

item.description: It's been a while... I'm back with my thoughts on the Twitter and Facebook assault on free speech and some updates to our JPBLiberty #CryptoClassAction

item.title: Meet Oculus Quest 2 [Accidentally Published Leaked]
item.dc:creator: brianoflondon
item.description:
My kids wanted to by Oculus Quest a month ago and fortunately it was just beginning to go out of stock, I told them to wait as their older, wiser dad could tell when a product was on the way out.
From https://www.facebookblueprint.com/student/activity/211338 Qualcomm Snapdragon XR2 Processor 6GB RAM 3D Positional Audio New Controller Ergonomics Nearly 2K Resolution per eye - over 50% more pixels than Quest 1 Up to 256GB Storage Quest Games will work on Quest 2 Lighter than original Quest
